item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, December 7, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Just: Just a Command Runner (121 points | 64 comments)
2. I algorithmically donated $5000 to Open Source (207 points | 40 comments)
3. MIT largest open-source car design dataset, incl aerodynamics, to speed design (56 points | 11 comments)
4. Beekeepers halt honey awards over 'huge fraud' in global supply chain (44 points | 36 comments)
5. Protecting Undersea Internet Cables Is a Tech Nightmare (55 points | 41 comments)
6. Show HN: Countless.dev – A website to compare every AI model: LLMs, TTSs, STTs (159 points | 46 comments)

8. Ask HN: Next best to incorporate other than Delaware? (31 points | 25 comments)
9. Helsing at Eurorust and the Oxidation of Defense (33 points | 18 comments)
10. Hiroshi Nagai: Japan's Sun-Drenched Americana (138 points | 23 comments)

13. Can life emerge around a white dwarf? (79 points | 53 comments)

16. Biggest shell programs (169 points | 82 comments)

20. The electric shock behind Europe's stuttering EV future (33 points | 20 comments)
21. Lies I was told about collab editing, Part 1: Algorithms for offline editing (244 points | 85 comments)
22. Mathics 7.0 – Open-source alternative to Mathematica (89 points | 12 comments)
23. Accessing a DRM Framebuffer to display an image (47 points | 5 comments)

25. Mistakes as a new manager (261 points | 110 comments)
26. OpenAI Reinforcement Fine-Tuning Research Program (191 points | 45 comments)
27. Dickies moving its headquarters from Texas to California (9 points | 8 comments)
28. 21 Algol 60 Compilers in 1962 (37 points | 29 comments)
29. Japanese scientists were pioneers of AI; they're being written out of history (18 points | 3 comments)
30. Install postmarketOS on Android phone and use Docker as a home server (269 points | 104 comments)
